title: Schedule a Vessel Arrival
description: A shipping agent requests a berth for an incoming container vessel. The port scheduler must find an available berth and time slot.

tasks.description: Receive the vessel nomination, including ETA, vessel size (LOA, beam), and cargo details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator correctly identifies the vessel 'MSC London' and its specifications.

tasks.description: Check the berth schedule for availability based on vessel size and requested ETA.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator finds an open slot at Berth 5 that can accommodate the vessel's size.

tasks.description: Allocate the berth, schedule pilot and tug services, and send confirmation to the agent.
tasks.expected_outcome: Berth 5 is allocated, services are booked, and a confirmation is sent.
